name: Apple Cinnamon Cream Cheese Muffins
author: Almond Breeze
summary: Sweet cinnamon muffins made with almondmilk and filled with apples and cream cheese. Muffins may be frozen. To reheat, leave wrapped muffins on the counter overnight, or microwave a frozen muffin on 50% power for about 20 seconds.
ingredients: ¾ cup Almond Breeze Vanilla almondmilk
¾ cup peeled, chopped green apple
½ (8 ounce) package reduced-fat cream cheese, torn into 1/2-inch pieces
chopped Blue Diamond® Honey Roasted Almonds
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F and line 12 muffin cups with paper liners
Stir together pancake mix, Almond Breeze almondmilk, sugar, oil, extract, and cinnamon in a medium bowl
Lightly stir in apple, cranberries, and cream cheese
Spoon into prepared cups and sprinkle with almonds
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean
Let cool, then store in a covered container with a loose fitting lid
